articles.title: PCB appeals against ICC's decision to award Rawalpindi pitch demerit point - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The appeal was one of the first actions of the new PCB administration, led by Najam Sethi, who replaced Ramiz Raja late last month
articles.content:
NewsThe appeal was one of the first actions of the new PCB administration, led by Najam Sethi, who replaced Ramiz Raja late last month
Jarrod Kimber is a writer for ESPNcricinfo. @ajarrodkimber

articles.title: 'Teammates Must Be Proud Over Their Captain'-Kapil Dev Says 'There is Huge Doubt' Over Rohit Sharma's Fitne - News18
articles.description: Former India captain Kapil Dev, who knows a thing or two about lifting World Cup, said that Rohit is one of the best when it comes to his cricket skills, but same can’t be said about his fitness.
articles.content: Over the years fans have argued how Virat Kohli was a better captain than Rohit Sharma. And one argument they used to cite was how Kohli was much ahead than Rohit when it comes to fitness. In-fact, t… [+2140 chars]
